entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @w_terrence That is strange. Even distancing.  Or is it going to resurface on many who are out there during the "riot" is the question.Hopefully it's gone. Sadly,seems like the only concrete truth is George Floyd and Coronavirus deaths did occur. The other things can be manipulation or not.
